content: {"name": "Project Hospitality @ Vanderbilt Moravian Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "This is a mobile pantry maybe it will be late due to the traffic please wait 15 min from the time of arrival", "email": "", "url": "https://projecthospitality.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "285 Vanderbilt Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Clifton", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10304", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6185067, "longitude": -74.0809024}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 448-1544", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
